title: Hungry man got his arm stuck in a toilet while trying to retrieve a live fish he was about to cook
text:
A man got his arm stuck in a toilet after the live fish he was saving for dinner leaped out of his hands and made a bid for freedom through the pipes in his dormitory's bathroom.

After being rescued from the toilet the unidentified man in south-western China revealed he had been looking for an escaped fish, which he had been keeping in a bucket in the bathroom.

When pulling it out to presumably kill, gut, and cook it for his dinner, the slippery fish made its bid for freedom down the porcelain squat toilet.

The man later told his rescuers the fish had escaped as he pulled it out of the bucket where he had been keeping it in the bathroom

At least two firefighters were involved in the delicate operation to free the man's arm from the squat toilet bowl

The video of the unidentified man shows him with his right arm deep in the toilet's plumbing system, unable to move

A video of his rescue on October 3 shows how the man, lying on the tiles of his workers' dormitory toilet in China, had his hand and arm firmly lodged inside the pipes.

The footage, which has been viewed nearly three million times in one day, shows the firefighters working to free the unidentified man's arm from the sanitary system.

To get him free the rescuers in Taijiang County, S.E. Qian Prefecture, had to slowly chisel away at the porcelain and concrete.

A frame from the video shows (left) how the man's arm was firmly wedged into the toilet's piping. It took firefighters 30 minutes to slowly chip away at the porcelain and free his arm

Firefighters cover the trapped man's face to protect it from the flying chips of porcelain and concrete as they work to liberate him

The firefighters covered the man's face, as they performed the delicate operation, that took a painstaking 30 minutes to complete.

Eventually the man was liberated from his awkward predicament, largely unscathed.

He was left with just a slightly swollen right arm and no other major grazes or bruises, beyond his pride.

The fish was not recovered.
description: A video of the man's rescue on October 3 shows him lying on the tiles of his workers' dormitory toilet, in Taijiang County, with his hand and arm firmly lodged inside the pipes.
